content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great investment for your stay in Magdeburg. How much do you think is a fair price for the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your hospitality. I'm looking for a place that offers a good value for my budget. Since the apartment is unfurnished, I think a price that reflects the work I'll need to put into it would be most fair. What is your lowest price point?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I always aim to provide the best possible living experience for my tenants. However, I also need to ensure that I'm compensated fairly for the investment I've made in this property. Given the prime location and the recent construction, I think a price around 800 Euro per month would be quite reasonable. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 800 Euro per month is higher than what I had anticipated for an unfurnished apartment. Could we discuss a lower price? Perhaps one that takes into account the work I'll need to do to make the apartment livable?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand that you're looking for a bargain, but I must remind you of the quality of the apartment and its central location. A price of 800 Euro is very competitive for a newly built apartment in the city center. Are you willing to pay this amount to secure such a prime living space?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment does offer an excellent location and I appreciate the quality. However, as a student, I'm on a budget. Could we negotiate a price closer to 650 Euro per month? This would better align with my financial situation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I'm willing to negotiate, but your proposed price of 650 Euro per month is significantly lower than what I'm asking. The apartment's location and amenities justify a higher price point. How about we meet in the middle at 725 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counter-offer of 725 Euro per month is more aligned with what I'm willing to pay. However, I'm still not sure if I can afford it as a student. Could we discuss further details regarding the amenities and any potential discounts for long-term rent?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Certainly, we can discuss the amenities and potential discounts. However, the price of 725 Euro per month is already a fair compromise. Would you be willing to pay this amount for the convenience and quality of the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your persistence is commendable. I understand that the apartment offers great value, and your counter of 725 Euro per month is indeed a fair compromise. I'm willing to accept this price to secure such a prime location. I agree to the price of 725 Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment will be a wonderful home for you, and I'm sure you'll enjoy the central location. Thank you for choosing my property. Let's proceed with the rental contract. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
